thread.title: Fantasy football: Puka Nacua, Tyreek Hill lead Week 1 wide receivers rankings
thread.title_full: Fantasy football: Puka Nacua, Tyreek Hill lead Week 1 wide receivers rankings

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Fantasy football: Puka Nacua, Tyreek Hill lead Week 1 wide receivers rankings
text:
By Alex Butler ,
5 hours ago MIAMI, Sept. 5 (UPI) -- Puka Nacua, Tyreek Hill and Davante Adams lead my Top 50 fantasy football wide receiver rankings for Week 1.
Puka Nacua (R) of the Los Angeles Rams leads my Week 1 fantasy football wide receiver rankings. File Photo by Tannen Maury/UPI A.J. Brown and Justin Jefferson are my other Top 5 options. Amon-Ra St. Brown, CeeDee Lamb, Mike Evans , Nico Collins and Ja'Marr Chase round out my Top 10 plays.
My Week 1 rankings for quarterbacks, running backs and tight ends also will be available.
All positional rankings will be updated throughout the week. Players from the Kansas City Chiefs - Baltimore Ravens game will be removed after their season-opening match Thursday in Kansas City, Mo. Players also will be removed from or adjusted within the rankings based on injuries.
Week 1 wide receiver rankings
Miami Dolphins star Tyreek Hill is an elite weekly option and should help his fantasy football stock owners succeed in Week 1. File Photo by Larry Marano/UPI 1. Puka Nacua, Los Angeles Rams at DET
2. Tyreek Hill, Miami Dolphins vs. JAX
Las Vegas Raiders wide receiver Davante Adams (L) is my No. 3 player for Week 1. File Photo by Mike Goulding/UPI 3. Davante Adams, Las Vegas Raiders at LAC
4. A.J. Brown, Philadelphia Eagles vs. GB
Dallas Cowboys star CeeDee Lamb sits at No. 7 in my Week 1 fantasy football wide receiver rankings. File Photo by Ian Halperin/UPI 5. Justin Jefferson, Minnesota Vikings at NYG
6. Amon-Ra St. Brown, Detroit Lions vs. LAR
D.J. Moore (2) of the Chicago Bears is the No. 17 player in my Week 1 wide receiver rankings. File Photo by Mark Black/UPI 7. CeeDee Lamb, Dallas Cowboys at CLE
